Nerangs.ab: nazdik-deraḫt gaz nabāšad anār niz šāyad va haft šāḫ-e barsom pāk kardan va pas kosti nō kardan va fanām moḥkam bastan xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ aṣ̌əm vohū yek ḫᵛāndan

"If there is no tamarisk nearby, a pomegranate tree is as well allowed. He should clean seven branches. Then, he should tie a new kosti and fasten his padām. He should then recite xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ and one Aṣ̌əm Vohū."
